name: Telebats
description:
Fixed: Input bug where one joystick controlled two bats
--------------------------------------------

Telebats is a multiplayer game where you throw your eyeball to kill your enemies! (And also teleport to it!)
A casual multiplayer versus game made for Game Maker's Toolkit Jam.

Controls:

WASD + left ctrl (or q and e)

ARROWS + Space

Joysticks!
